title: Can someone actually explain to me why the current punishment system is this way
body: if you get into a game and another player decides to feed the enemy team and take your jungle buffs and harass you and you disconnect because its no longer fun and you are punished over the person ruining the game for the rest of the team or if they are in a party and all ruin it for other people, is it really fair that the person trying to have fun is punished over the person intentionally being toxic...like i know this may be one of the all time low customer friendly mobas, but thats still pretty stupid..

replies.body:
1) Report them instead of performing an action that is EASILY reported (you disconnecting intentionally, which is a leaving/afk )and detectable -logs-
2) Since you did not report them, they go unpunished.  So follow #1

3) Be part of the solution and not the problem and the system will alleviate these problems.
